PricingRecipeTableMapping.name: PricingRecipeTableMapping
PricingRecipeTableMapping.description: Represents the mapping of pricing components of a lookup table with the chosen pricing recipe.

FileBasedDecisionTableName.description: Name of the file-based decision table.

IsInternal.description: Indicates if the price recipe field mapping record is created internally by the Salesforce platform (true) or not (false).

LookupTableId.description: The lookup table associated with the mapped fields.

PricingComponentType.description: The pricing component field data on which the decision table is built.

PricingRecipeId.description: The pricing data store associated with this pricing recipe field mappings.
